statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_contract WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type FROM vendor_contract WHERE contract_type = 'Service';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contract WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, start_date FROM vendor_contract WHERE contract_type IS NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, contract_id, end_date FROM vendor_contract WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'Acme%';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contract WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_type FROM vendor_contract WHERE contract_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contract WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contract_id FROM vendor_contract WHERE contract_type = 'service';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contract ORDER BY start_date DESC, vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Company A';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date, contract_value FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE property_id = 100 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_date, contract_value FROM vendors JOIN contracts ON vendors.vendor_id = contracts.vendor_id WHERE contract_value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 5000 ORDER BY contract_start_date ASC;
SELECT contract_id, vendor_id, contract_start_date, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE contract_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_name, location FROM properties WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT contract_id, vendor_id, contract_start_date FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE contract_id = (SELECT contract_id FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000);
SELECT property_name, location FROM properties WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_name FROM Vendor;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Contract WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT property_name, address, size_sq_ft FROM Property WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT lease_id, start_date, end_date, rent_amount FROM Lease ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM Vendor WHERE contact_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT property_name, address, size_sq_ft FROM Property ORDER BY size_sq_ft DESC;
SELECT contract_id, amount FROM Contract WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT lease_id, start_date, end_date FROM Lease WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments;
SELECT contract_date, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 2 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT property_address, property_type, property_size FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT property_address, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_size >= 100;
SELECT contract_id, contract_amount, contract_date FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
